sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./ProgramsSection.css"; // आप ये css नीचे दिए code की तरह बनाएँ const programs = [ { title: "English For Today", image: "/images/program-1.jpg", // अपनी image public/images/ में डालें price: "$60.99", teacher: { name: "Mary Morden", image: "/images/teacher-1.jpg", role: "Arts Designer" }, desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec sed purus consectetur,", sits: 30, lessons: 11, hours: 60 }, { title: "Graphics Arts", image: "/images/program-2.jpg", price: "$60.99", teacher: { name: "Mary Morden", image: "/images/teacher-1.jpg", role: "Arts Designer" }, desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec sed purus consectetur,", sits: 30, lessons: 11, hours: 60 }, { title: "General Science", image: "/images/program-3.jpg", price: "$60.99", teacher: { name: "Mary Morden", image: "/images/teacher-1.jpg", role: "Arts Designer" }, desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec sed purus consectetur,", sits: 30, lessons: 11, hours: 60 } ]; export default function ProgramsSection() { return (
Our Programs

We Offer An Exclusive
Program For Kids

{programs.map((prog, idx) => (
{prog.price}
{prog.title}
{prog.desc}
{prog.teacher.name}
{prog.teacher.role}
{prog.sits} Sits {prog.lessons} Lessons {prog.hours} Hours
))}
); }
